/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. In the distance, a highway overpass can be seen, indicating the bustling nature of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the trees and the expanse of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing its blend of urban development and natural beauty.
